attributes.action: force utility  companies to reduce their prices in line with falling oil prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Penalise the utility companies into reducing the price of domestic fuel costs now that the price of oil has halved in the last week from its summer high of $146 a barrel.  The forecourt price is reducing why not theirs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
